00019 //We need to write the path format to the devpak, if this does not exist we will
00020 //assume windows format, if it does exist then wxFileName must use the correct
00021 //format
00022 #if defined(__WXMSW__)
00023 #define PATH_FORMAT wxT("Windows")
00024 #elif defined(__WXMOTIF__) || defined(__WXGTK20__) || defined(__WXGTK__) || defined(__WXCOCOA__)
00025 #define PATH_FORMAT wxT("Unix")
00026 #elif defined(__WXMAC__)
00027 #define PATH_FORMAT wxT("Mac")
00028 #else
00029 #define PATH_FORMAT wxT("Undefined")
00030 #endif

00046 class FileInfo
00047 {
00048     public: //Constructors and Destructor
00049         FileInfo();
00050         ~FileInfo();
00051     public: // Accessors
00052         const wxString GetSourceName(){return _SourceName;};
00053         void SetSourceName(const wxString& SourceName){_SourceName = SourceName;};
00054         const wxString GetDestinationDirectory(){return _DestinationDirectory;};
00055         void SetDestinationDirectory(const wxString& DestinationDirectory){_DestinationDirectory = DestinationDirectory;};
00056         const wxString GetDestinationName(){return _DestinationName;};
00057         void SetDestinationName(const wxString& DestinationName){_DestinationName = DestinationName;};
00058         const wxString GetOptionalFlags(){return _OptionalFlags;};
00059         void SetOptionalFlags(const wxString& OptionalFlags){_OptionalFlags = OptionalFlags;};
00060         bool GetIsDirectory(){return _IsDirectory;};
00061         void SetIsDirectory(bool IsDirectory){_IsDirectory = IsDirectory;};
00062     private:
00063         wxString _SourceName; //The name of the source file, relative to the .DevPackage file.
00064         wxString _DestinationDirectory; //The destination directory. Please note that Destdir must *always* end with a backkslash (\)
00065         wxString _DestinationName; //If this is specified, the copied file will be renamed to the specified filename
00066         wxString _OptionalFlags; //There is only one flag at present recursive which recursively copies a directories contents  
00067         bool _IsDirectory;
00068 };
